document_data.name: Arval
document_data.mainbody: '''Arval''' was a male [[human]] of [[Neverwinter]] on the [[Sword Coast North]] in the 1370s [[DR]].

History.Gameplay: When the [[Kalach-Cha]] came to the end of the [[Bryce crypt]], Arval would be about to finish the ritual. He and his followers would attack the Kalach-Cha. However, [[Lisbet Bryce]] then completed the ritual, causing Arval and his followers to be revived as shadows, who would attack once more.
